# MythofySlashHub Permissions Guide

# This file is auto-generated in your plugin data folder with all current server permissions.

# Per-command permissions (replace <command> with the alias, e.g., hub, minigames, dev, etc):
MythofySlashHub.command.<command>

# Send commands:
MythofySlashHub.sendall    # Allows use of /send all <server> and /send <fromServer> <toServer>
MythofySlashHub.send       # Allows use of /send <player> <server> and /send [<player1> ...] <server>

# Per-server go permissions (auto-generated in plugin data folder):
MythofySlashHub.Gohub         # Allows use of /hub to go to hub
MythofySlashHub.Gominigames   # Allows use of /minigames to go to minigames
MythofySlashHub.Godev         # Allows use of /dev to go to dev
MythofySlashHub.Gobuild       # Allows use of /build to go to build
MythofySlashHub.Golifesteal   # Allows use of /lifesteal to go to lifesteal
MythofySlashHub.Gobox         # Allows use of /box to go to box
